statements: SELECT * FROM actuarial_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder_name FROM actuarial_data WHERE coverage_amount > 50000
SELECT policy_holder_name, age, coverage_amount FROM actuarial_data WHERE risk_factor < 0.5
SELECT * FROM actuarial_data WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC
SELECT policy_number, coverage_amount FROM actuarial_data WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM actuarial_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY risk_factor DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM actuarial_data WHERE risk_factor < 0.5;
SELECT policy_number, age, coverage_amount FROM actuarial_data WHERE coverage_amount >= 100000 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_holder_name FROM actuarial_data WHERE risk_factor > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM actuarial_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND coverage_amount < 50000;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, gender FROM Policyholders ORDER BY gender ASC
SELECT policy_id, name, age FROM Policyholders WHERE gender = 'M'
SELECT policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM Policyholders ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC
SELECT policy_id, name, age, gender FROM Policyholders WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT name, age, policy_start_date FROM Policyholders WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policyholders JOIN Claims ON Policyholders.policy_id = Claims.policy_id WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY policy_start_date ASC

SELECT policy_id, name, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_reason FROM Policyholders JOIN Claims ON Policyholders.policy_id = Claims.policy_id WHERE gender = 'M' AND claim_amount < 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM PolicyHolders WHERE policy_holder_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT name, address FROM PolicyHolders JOIN Policies ON PolicyHolders.policy_holder_id = Policies.policy_holder_id WHERE Policies.policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM PolicyHolders ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT ph.name, p.policy_type FROM PolicyHolders ph JOIN Policies p ON ph.policy_holder_id = p.policy_holder_id WHERE p.policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT c.claim_id, p.policy_type, c.claim_amount FROM Claims c JOIN Policies p ON c.policy_id = p.policy_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 5000;

SELECT ph.name, p.policy_type, c.claim_amount FROM PolicyHolders ph JOIN Policies p ON ph.policy_holder_id = p.policy_holder_id JOIN Claims c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id ORDER BY ph.name, c.claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT policyholder_name, date_of_birth FROM Policyholders ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT premium_id, policy_id, premium_amount FROM Premiums ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT policyholder_id, policyholder_name FROM Policyholders WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT Policies.policy_id, Policies.policy_type, Premiums.premium_amount FROM Policies JOIN Premiums ON Policies.policy_id = Premiums.policy_id;

SELECT Policyholders.policyholder_id, Policyholders.policyholder_name, Policies.policy_type, Premiums.premium_amount FROM Policyholders JOIN Policies ON Policyholders.policyholder_id = Policies.policyholder_id JOIN Premiums ON Policies.policy_id = Premiums.policy_id;

SELECT Claims.claim_id, Claims.claim_date, Policies.policy_type, Premiums.payment_date FROM Claims JOIN Policies ON Claims.policy_id = Policies.policy_id JOIN Premiums ON Policies.policy_id = Premiums.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, age FROM Policyholders ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date FROM Policies WHERE premium > 1000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, amount FROM Claims WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Beneficiaries WHERE relationship='spouse';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE age > 30;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM Policies WHERE premium > 1000.00 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE amount BETWEEN 500.00 AND 1000.00;
SELECT name, relationship FROM Beneficiaries ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT policy_id, action, action_date FROM PolicyHistory WHERE action = 'Renewal';
